nodes.text: The Three Families war camp was a war camp that could be found on the poisonous world of Quesh operated by the Three Families during the year of 3643 BBY in the time era known as the Cold War.

The camp was constructed in 3643 BBY by the Three Families as a result of the Empire attacking Quesh, a planet of high value to the Hutts due to its valuable Venenit queshaaga. Shared by the Hutts and Republic, the camp quickly became operational with a full team of staff and supplies, with Broga, the head of the organization, spending much of his time at the camp.
